categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Leona Makk was a female pilot who captained the bulk hauler Voxen Tass for Shang Lines during the Galactic Civil War. She was a supporter of the Rebel Alliance and used her position at Shang Lines to supply the Rebels with information on local shipping.
During the Blockade of the Endocray sector, Makk was critical in delivering an Alliance strike team to Argovia, where they destroyed a sensor net established by the Galactic Empire.
